tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I and my family have GOD like faith in the doctor..v have been going to Mandira Singh doctor since the year 2000.My mother underwent histectomy which was successfully done by doctor in Medwin hospital..My sisters deliveries were very successful who followed advice of the doctor after conception..n now here my turn goes..I am v.happy with the response and the treatment which the doctor gives..No unnecessary medical examinations and prefers simple medications along with exercise..The doctor explains before hand as to y the treatment or test is being done and what does it signify..Personally I feel the warmth and gentleness of the  doctor which makes me feel stronger and healthier..I highly recommend the doctor who makes evry problem simpler n puts back smile on the faces.
reply_text: Thank you very much Lavanya, your feedback really means a lot to me. God bless you and your family!

tags: None
review: Dr.Mandira is god-sent. She is woman first who understands what a woman goes through, then a doctor. She is an amazing human being. Caring, Approachable, Perfectionist, Gentle, are some of the words I can associate with her. Right from the day I first met her till the date I delivered, she was with me anytime I wanted her. She is what any doctor should be, practical humble, active listener and a true professional. No unnecessary tests or medications - just her encouraging words were enough to make me alright. Dr.Mandira's approach is very unique - she makes an immediate connect with you as soon as you share your medical concern with her.   I wish her all the good luck and happiness. She is wonderful.
reply_text:
Dear Safia, reading your feedback brought tears in my eyes.I am overwhelmed by your caring and kind words. No money, no worldly treasures could have given me the satisfaction or happiness which your words have given me.
I have also to say that you and your husband have been excellent from the time I met you till the time you got discharged from the hospital.Never ever troubled me unnecessarily.
May God bless you and your family. Always be happy.
Thank you very very much for your words once again ;you can never imagine how much it means to me

tags: None
review: Dr Mandira not only treats the patient with required medication but also treats psychologically,  motivating them for recovery with personal touch. Hence a patient can speak & disclose all the issues. I recommend her to all my friends for any gynic issues.
reply_text: Thank you so much Kalyani, Really appreciate it

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well, Dr Mandira Singh is a Doctor of few but the exact right words and guidance, she is a person of action rather than words. We have been consulting her for a couple of months now and being treated with great care and guidance. We were terrified with an unexpected pain followed by passing of fleshy clot that occurred recently after which we requested for an emergency consult, though she was not present, she guided us through another doctor to get the required diagnosis done and later walked us through the rest of the treatment with the assurance needed. We never write reviews, but this Doctor needs to be recognized as we feel that there are a lot of people who need right medical treatment, care and guidance and the right expectations. Thank you Dr Mandira!
reply_text: Thank You very much for your kind words, I deeply appreciate it and Wish you the very best in your life. Thank you once again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ** ** ********Really mam you are a great human being. Very very nice treatment.2yrs back Dr. Mandira treated my infertility prblm and conceived in 5mnths but after that went my village so couldn't visit Mandira Mam. Got aborted in 6months. since then facing same problem and facing very bad situation in in-laws house. recently I pinged Dr. Mandira and responded am really happy. again my lost hopes were raised.i know this time also Mam will makes my life successful but this time plz mam be with me.tnq so much Mam. ur my only hope and goddess.
reply_text:
Thank You my dear for your great feedback, I am no goddess but definitely try to do the best for my patients. My principal in life has been to treat every patient as my relative , in that regard if I am able to alleviate some of the symptoms of my patients it gives me great joy.
Do not worry you will again conceive but please do not take any tension. Always remember God is with you . Thank you again
